name: Honey Bran Muffins
author: June M
summary: These muffins are made with bran cereal, and sweetened with pineapple juice, brown sugar, and honey.  The recipe requires the batter to be refrigerated for at least 3 hours.  It can be made the night before, and then baked in the morning.  Makes 20 regular muffins, or 12 jumbo muffins.
directions: In a small bowl, combine pineapple juice and raisins
In a medium bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt
In a large mixing bowl, combine brown sugar, oil, honey, and eggs; mix well
Add cereal mixture, and mix well
Batter will be thin; it will thicken as it chills
Cover, and refrigerate for at least 3 hours or overnight
Fill greased or paper lined muffin cups 3/4 full
Bake in a preheated 400 degree F (205 degree C) oven, for 20 to 25 minutes
Cool in pan 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack
